QuestData.Title: A Proper Weapon
QuestData.Description: First things first, though.$b$bA proper trainee needs a proper weapon. And a scrupulous trainee builds his own... or at least gathers the materials.$b$bThe switches which grow nearby should suffice for any respectable weapon. You'll also need to shop for black walnut extract to treat the wood. While you're there, get some ale, for...$b$b<Wu pauses.>$b$b...well, you know what ale is for.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Rattan Switches from the area around the market in the Tian Monastery.$b$bPurchase a vial of Black Walnut Extract from June Whiteblossom.$b$bPurchase 3 Triple-Bittered Ales from Brewmaster Lei Kanglei.
QuestData.RewardText: <Groundskeeper Wu gratefully scoops up the gathered materials.>$b$bI will have a weapon prepared for you by the end of your training. Now, onto the real work.
